ai-tha-ap306:1.3_0: like a tree of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap306:2.1_0: At a time when the Buddha tread,
ai-tha-ap306:2.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha;
ai-tha-ap306:3.2_0: should teach Dhamma in detail to the meaning,
ai-tha-ap306:3.3_0: The Buddha has drawn back the veil from the open;
ai-tha-ap306:4.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap306:4.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap306:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap306:5.4_0: each of the fruit of Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap306:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap306:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dhamma.
ai-tha-ap306:9.1_0: with wisdom is a fourth kind of senior.
